description.raw:
pull request #2022 is huge and I noticed some things that could be easily split out. I tried to do it in clean commits, but I made some errors. I'll try to summarize:

* 2e6d0a5 Move enum `sensors::SensorCategory` definition from Sensor.hh to SensorTypes.hh

* f09d591 Sensor.hh minor cleanup:
    * fix header guard
    * remove unused `poseSub`
    * move `UpdateImpl` to protected function section
    * move `DisconnectUpdated` implementation to Sensor.cc
    * improve doxygen

Then the rest of the commits are about adding `const` to a few functions (started in e886b11, finished in the others), and also moving some `protected` functions around, fixing header guards, and so on.

There are also failing tests in pull request #2022, so I'm hoping to split out smaller changes to narrow down the source of test failures.

  • 2e6d0a5 Move enum sensors::SensorCategory definition from Sensor.hh to SensorTypes.hh

  • f09d591 Sensor.hh minor cleanup:

    • move DisconnectUpdated implementation to Sensor.cc
    • improve doxygen

Then the rest of the commits are about adding const to a few functions (started in e886b11, finished in the others), and also moving some protected functions around, fixing header guards, and so on.

There are also failing tests in pull request #2022, so I'm hoping to split out smaller changes to narrow down the source of test failures.

title.raw: PIMPL sensors: subset of pull request #2022
